name: BOUN-MA-ZE
description:
Made for ZGBJAM (48h) in 2018 with the theme "Bounce"

Description:

Reach the end () of the labyrinth and don't stop bouncing or you can't move.

Avoid enemies (    ) by jumping higher.

And remember: bounce, bounce, bounce!

Controls: ActionGameboy KeyKeyboard Key (bgb emulator)Move +  (to bounce) + (to bounce)JumpPause Credits:

Jorge Pedraza (@Deebrol): code and graphics

Zalo (@Zalo): Engine -> More info here

* Sorry. No music due the lack of knowledge and time but you can put your favourite OST in the background :)
